returns.balance: Total value of the asset in the platform

params._rewardTokenAddresses: Address of reward token for platform

removePToken(uint256).details: Remove a supported asset by passing its index.      This method can only be called by the system Governor

params._assetIndex: Index of the asset to be removed

setPTokenAddress(address,address).details: Provide support for asset by passing its pToken address.      This method can only be called by the system Governor

params._pToken: Address for the corresponding platform token

params._rewardTokenAddresses: Address array of the reward token

supportsAsset(address).details: Retuns bool indicating whether asset is supported by strategy

transferToken(address,uint256).details: Transfer token to governor. Intended for recovering tokens stuck in      strategy contracts, i.e. mistaken sends.

params._amount: Amount of the asset to transfer

params._asset: Address of the asset to withdraw

checkBalance(address).notice: Get the total asset value held in the underlying platform      This includes any interest that was generated since depositing.      The exchange rate between the cToken and asset gradually increases,      causing the cToken to be worth more corresponding asset.

claimGovernance().notice: Claim Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the new Governor.

collectRewardTokens().notice: Collect accumulated COMP and send to Harvester.

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Deposit asset into the underlying platform

depositAll().notice: Deposit the entire balance of any supported asset in the strategy into the underlying platform

governor().notice: Returns the address of the current Governor.

initialize(address[],address[],address[].notice: Internal initialize function, to set up initial internal state

isGovernor().notice: Returns true if the caller is the current Governor.

safeApproveAllTokens().notice: Approve the spending of all assets by their corresponding cToken,      if for some reason is it necessary.

transferGovernance(address).notice: Transfers Governance of the contract to a new account (`newGovernor`). Can only be called by the current Governor. Must be claimed for this to complete

withdraw(address,address,uint256).notice: Withdraw an asset from the underlying platform

withdrawAll().notice: Remove all supported assets from the underlying platform and send them to Vault contract.
